attributes.action: Anjem Choudary to be placed under a control order
attributes.additional_details:
Following the tragic and brutal murder of Drummer Lee Rigby by radicalised Muslim extremists. This petition calls for a control order to be placed on the radical Muslim hate preacher Anjem Choudary.

The control order this petition seeks is necessary to prevent Anjem Choudary radicalising young men of Muslim faith who may be influenced by Choudary's warped teachings to carry out acts of murder and terrorism against British citizens and nationals of other jurisdictions.

The terms of the control order to include:-

1) The denial of access to the internet and email.

2) The denial of mobile telecommunication devices

3) The wearing of a electronic tag

4) Prohibition of all broadcast activities


For Lee

rejection.details: The investigation into an individual as described is an operational policing matter for the relevant police force.
